vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 2 to increase the service contract with Evans Enterprise, Inc. for electric motor repair services - Not to exceed $842,713.00, from $3,370,854.00 to $4,213,567.00 - Financing: General Fund ($926.98) and Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($841,786.02) (subject to annual appropriations)
